page.title: 20MANOR FARM,BORROWASH CREDITS
page.content: Manor Farm belongs to Mr.Hedley and his Grandmother.It is a mixed farm covering 120 acres,approximately 23 fields.There are 40 cows including 19 young stock and 3 calves.The only other animals on the farm are 4 dogs and a horse called M'Lord. {THANKS}are due to a great many people who allowed us to visit their premises and/or ask them a great many questions. { PARTICULAR THANKS must go to {the three participating schools and {the teachers collecting the material, {namely: Mrs.M.Calladine, Mr.R.Eagles and St.Werburgh's C.E. Primary School. Mr.D.Hine and Asterdale Primary School. Mr.R.Brown and Ashbrook Junior School.
